INFO     makolator  gen('$PRJ/tests/testdata/main.txt.mako', '$GEN/main.txt')
INFO     makolator  gen('$PRJ/tests/testdata/sub.txt.mako', '$GEN/sub1.txt')
INFO     makolator  gen('$PRJ/tests/testdata/sub.txt.mako', '$GEN/sub2.txt')
INFO     makolator  inplace('$PRJ/tests/testdata/inplace.txt.mako', '$GEN/inplace.txt')
